divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work and saw the glowing, pulsating red-orange object to the west over Omaha, I noticed it because I frequently look at the stars when I'm outside at night. I thought it was a plane or an antenna but it seemed much too high up to be an antenna, and it wasn't moving, just hovering and gently pulsing. I drove past a few buildings and tried to look at it from a different angle to try and figure out what it was, but it was gone. This was between 9:12-9:15PM. I'd be interested if anyone else saw it, maybe for a longer period so I know I'm not just seeing things with an overactive imagination.
Summary: Glowing, pulsating red-orange orb appeared for a few seconds, I drove by a few buildings and then it was gone.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around November 29th 2012
